#summary Check webwork configuration

=== Check webwork configuration ===

The following configuration snippet would check webwork configuration.

{{{
  <build>
    <plugins>
      ...
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.openwebtop.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-precheck-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <goals>
              <goal>webwork</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <webworkConfiguration>
            <webworkConfigurationFiles>
              <webworkConfigurationFile>
                src/main/resources/xwork.xml
              </webworkConfigurationFile>
              <webworkConfigurationFile>
                src/main/resources/xwork-part1.xml
              </webworkConfigurationFile>
              <webworkConfigurationFile>
                src/main/resources/xwork-part2.xml
              </webworkConfigurationFile>
            </webworkConfigurationFiles>
          </webworkConfiguration>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
    </plugins>
  </build>
}}}
